other_tests.findings: Necrosis along with endomysial and perivascular lymphocytic infiltrates; no fibrosis or fatty infiltration was seen.
Initially normal; subsequent EMG revealed a myopathic pattern.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressed from normal to showing a myopathic pattern.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed diagnosis of LGMDR2 based on a compound heterozygous variant of the DYSF gene.
